sourcesContent:
Visions

import { Component , ViewEncapsulation} from '@angular/core'; import { ThemeService } from '../theme.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-vision', templateUrl: './vision.component.html', styleUrls: ['./vision.component.scss'], encapsulation: ViewEncapsulation.Emulated }) export class VisionComponent { constructor(private themeService: ThemeService){} visions = [ { imageUrl: '../assets/images/gif/Infra.gif', title: 'Unveiling the Deployment Process of My Website' }, ]; currentTheme: string = 'light'; ngOnInit(): void { this.themeService.currentTheme$.subscribe(theme => { this.currentTheme = theme; }); } }
